results.definition: having or showing arrogant superiority to and disdain of those one views as unworthy
examples: some economists are disdainful of their colleagues in other social disciplines
very sniffy about breaches of etiquette
his mother eyed my clothes with a supercilious air
a more swaggering mood than usual"- W.L.Shirer
curled his lip in a supercilious smile
spoke in a sneering jeering manner
makes many a sharp comparison but never a mean or snide one
